room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: We chose the Tomb. The experience was amazing and will be returning to try another room. Highly recommend to anyone. Also enjoyed the trivia pursuit in the lobby.

room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: Did the Pharaoh's Tomb and it was amazing! Just the perfect mix between difficulty and fun. A great storyline, great atmosphere and an awesome experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: I can't recommend Trapped enough! The owners were very welcoming, friendly, and enthusiastic. The puzzles and clues were clever and challenging. As another reviewer mentioned, the rush of figuring out a particular problem is addictive! I can't wait to go again and tackle their other room and the rooms to come. My whole group had a wonderful time and achieved inflated senses of our own intelligence--it was money very well spent!
